#summary Opcodes for miscellaneous instructions

=== Miscellaneous Instructions ===

==== S2R ====
Store special register to general-purpose register.

Template opcode:
{{{
0010 000000 1110 xxxxxx 000000 aaaaaaaa 00000000 00000000 00000000 110100
xxxxxx: destination reg
aaaaaa: 01100100: SR_CTAid_Y;
	10100100: SR_CTAid_X;
	10000100: SR_Tid_X;
	01000100: SR_Tid_Y;
	10001010: SR_Clock_Hi;
	00001010: SR_Clock_Lo;
}}}
